text: David Joseph "Dave" Madden (December 17, 1931 â€“ January 16, 2014) was a Canadian-American actor. He was known for his role as Reuben Kincaid on The Partridge Family. Madden died on January 16, 2014 in Jacksonville, Florida. He died from complications of myelodysplastic syndrome. He was aged 82. ==References== ==Other websites== * * An Interview with Dave Madden at C'mon Get Happy - Partridge Family Fan Site * TMZ report on death - TMZ report on his death Category:1931 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Actors from Indiana Category:Actors from Ontario Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Canadian movie actors Category:Canadian stage actors Category:Canadian television actors Category:Canadian voice actors Category:Deaths from myelodysplastic syndrome Category:Disease-related deaths in Florida Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:People from Sarnia Category:People from Terre Haute, Indiana
title: Dave Madden
